context_bundle.summary: Claude.ai authentication flow - Google OAuth to sessionKey cookie extraction for custom clients.

onboarding.quick_start: Open DevTools Network tab, login to claude.ai, copy sessionKey from cookies
common_patterns: Key cookies: sessionKey (auth), lastActiveOrg (org UUID), anthropic-device-id, ajs_user_id
cf_clearance is Cloudflare bot protection - may need to pass
Flow: claude.ai -> Google OAuth -> redirect back -> sessionKey cookie set
Session generated fresh each Google auth, not reusable across logins
Firefox encrypts cookies (NSS/key4.db) - use own WebView instead of stealing browser cookies
known_errors: sessionKey expires - need re-auth flow when 401/403
Cloudflare may block if missing cf_clearance or user-agent
Google OAuth requires browser - can't do headless
